metadata.title: CVE-2023-5764 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A template injection flaw was found in Ansible where a user's controllerinternal templating operations may remove the unsafe designation fromtemplate data. This issue could allow an attacker to use a speciallycrafted file to introduce templating injection when supplying templatingdata.

criterions.comment: ansible package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
